channel.title: Blog on Smooth as consumption
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Smooth as consumption

item.title: Up and running
item.description: Hi there! This is my first post for my personal webpage. Stay tuned to see more of them coming. Let’s start with an incredible drawing from Akira. Why? Because Akira is awesome, that’s why. For those that might not know Akira, here they have a FAQ about the manga [SPOILERS], and I highly recommend reading it, aside from watching the animated movie. Akira As mentioned in the About section of my website, this website is based on the Jekyll/GitHub static site generator.
